useCase.name: Specify Remote Replication Policy for a Collection

mainSequence.step: Repository Manager accesses Replication Policy Settings through EDRMS Interface
Retrieve Current Policy Settings from Replication Policy Module
Query Existing Policies in EDRMS Database
Return Policies to Replication Policy Module
Replication Policy Module shows Current Policies to the EDRMS Interface
Display Current Policies to Repository Manager
Define/Update Policy for Collection via EDRMS Interface
Process Policy Specifications with Policy Patch
Update Policy in Database by Policy Patch
Confirm Update of Policy in Database
Initiate Policy Replication Update with Remote Storage Service
Acknowledge Replication Policy Update from Remote Storage Service
Confirm Policy Update through EDRMS Interface
Show Update Confirmation to Repository Manager
